channel.title: [VB.NET] Progress Bar Examples
channel.description:
Wellcome This is my second vb.net program
basicly what it is it demonstrates the diffrent uses of progress bars in vb.net
[code]Public Class Form1
Private Sub TrackBar1_Scroll(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles TrackBar1.Scroll ProgressBar1.Value = TrackBar1.Value End Sub
Private Sub Timer1_Tick(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Timer1.Tick ProgressBar2.Value = ProgressBar2.Value + 1 Label1.Text = (ProgressBar2.Value / ProgressBar2.Maximum * 100) Label1.Text = Label1.Text + "%" If ProgressBar2.Value = ProgressBar2.Maximum Then Timer1.Stop() MsgBox("Finished") End If End Sub
Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Timer1.Enabled = True Timer1.Start() Timer1.Interval = 100 End Sub
Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button2.Click Label1.Text = (ProgressBar2.Value / ProgressBar2.Maximum * 100) Label1.Text = Label1.Text + "%" ProgressBar2.Value = 0 End Sub
Private Sub Button3_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button3.Click Timer1.Enabled = False
End Sub
Private Sub Button4_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button4.Click ProgressBar3.Value = ProgressBar3.Value + 1 Label2.Text = (ProgressBar3.Value / ProgressBar3.Maximum * 100) Label2.Text = Label2.Text + "%" End Sub
Private Sub Button5_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button5.Click ProgressBar3.Value = ProgressBar3.Value - 1 Label2.Text = (ProgressBar3.Value / ProgressBar3.Maximum * 100) Label2.Text = Label2.Text + "%" End Sub End Class[/code]
[b]LINK[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/d/X4JR5]http://uppit.com/d/X4JR5[/url]

item.title: [VB.NET] Progress Bar Examples
item.dc:creator: @Ryan2 Ryan_
item.description:
@Ryan2 wrote:

Wellcome This is my second vb.net program

basicly what it is it demonstrates the diffrent uses of progress bars in vb.net

[code]Public Class Form1

Private Sub TrackBar1_Scroll(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles TrackBar1.Scroll
    ProgressBar1.Value = TrackBar1.Value
End Sub

Private Sub Timer1_Tick(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Timer1.Tick
    ProgressBar2.Value = ProgressBar2.Value + 1
    Label1.Text = (ProgressBar2.Value / ProgressBar2.Maximum * 100)
    Label1.Text = Label1.Text + "%"
    If ProgressBar2.Value = ProgressBar2.Maximum Then
        Timer1.Stop()
        MsgBox("Finished")
    End If
End Sub

Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
    Timer1.Enabled = True
    Timer1.Start()
    Timer1.Interval = 100
End Sub

Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button2.Click
    Label1.Text = (ProgressBar2.Value / ProgressBar2.Maximum * 100)
    Label1.Text = Label1.Text + "%"
    ProgressBar2.Value = 0
End Sub

Private Sub Button3_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button3.Click
    Timer1.Enabled = False

End Sub

Private Sub Button4_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button4.Click
    ProgressBar3.Value = ProgressBar3.Value + 1
    Label2.Text = (ProgressBar3.Value / ProgressBar3.Maximum * 100)
    Label2.Text = Label2.Text + "%"
End Sub

Private Sub Button5_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button5.Click
    ProgressBar3.Value = ProgressBar3.Value - 1
    Label2.Text = (ProgressBar3.Value / ProgressBar3.Maximum * 100)
    Label2.Text = Label2.Text + "%"
End Sub

End Class[/code]

LINK
http://uppit.com/d/X4JR5
